Self-Dual Pentadecahedron #3 (canonical)

C0  = 0.0544138103579736223915742328949

C6  = 0.603875471609676504944409278030 = tan(pi/14) * sqrt(7)
C7  = 0.626631214416626160441798949951
C8  = 0.639569329001362306042268036108
C9  = 0.675263186393048107140126794186

C13 = 1.142709787105667747578788391752

V0  = (  C4,   C4,  1.0)
V1  = (  C4,  -C4, -1.0)
V2  = ( -C4,   C4, -1.0)
V3  = ( -C2,  -C2,  1.0)
V4  = (-C10,   C1,   C9)
V5  = (  C1, -C10,   C9)
V6  = (-C10,  -C2,  -C8)
V7  = ( -C2, -C10,  -C8)
V8  = ( C11,  -C4,   C6)
V9  = ( -C4,  C11,   C6)
V10 = ( C13,  C13,  -C5)
V11 = ( C11,  -C7,  -C3)
V12 = ( -C7,  C11,  -C3)
V13 = (-C12,   C1,  -C0)
V14 = (  C1, -C12,  -C0)
